definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (on popular etymol. see 1Sa 25:25 infr.);—a churlish man of Carmel, whose widow David married 1Sa 25:3, 1Sa 25:4, 1Sa 25:5, 1Sa 25:9, 1Sa 25:10, 1Sa 25:14, 1Sa 25:19, 1Sa 25:25, 1Sa 25:25 ([[כִּשְׁמוֹ כֶּן־êהוּא נׇבָל שְׁמוֹ וּנְּבָלָה עִמּוֹ]]), v:1Sa 25:26 + 10 t. 1 S + 2Sa 2:2, 2Sa 3:3. LXX Nabal.
